original_title: André Rieu´s Magical Maastricht: Together in Music
overview: André Rieu’s Magical Maastricht celebrates 15 years of André’s glorious hometown concerts. The King of the Waltz has selected his most spectacular performances and emotional songs and will bring the joyous atmosphere of his iconic open-air concerts in Maastricht straight to your local cinemas.
title: André Rieu´s Magical Maastricht: Together in Music
